item.title: Democrats launch campaign for Virginia voters to join redistricting fight
item.description: A new group will raise money to mobilize voters for a proposed redistricting amendment as Democrats try to counter GOP-led efforts ahead of the midter...

item.title: Journalists confront new reality in reporting after FBI raid
item.description: Many saw the FBI search of a Washington Post reporter’s home as a jarring new step aimed at limiting their ability to gather information.

item.title: FBI executes search warrant at Washington Post reporter’s home
item.description: The search came as part of an investigation into a government contractor accused of illegally retaining classified government materials.

item.title: Senate blocks Venezuela war powers bill after Vance breaks deadlock
item.description: The vote failed after two Republicans withdrew their previous support under intense pressure from the Trump administration.
